Kim Schmahmann (amụrụ n'afọ 1955 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe nke bi na Cambridge, Massachusetts ugbu a

Ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Brickbottom Artists Building na Somerville, Massachusetts. Ihe osise ya na-ejikọta nka echiche na nka dị mma, na-eji esemokwu dị n'etiti echiche na ọrụ iji gosipụta esemokwu nke na-ebilite n'etiti ndị mmadụ na ọha mmadụ

Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe odide ya na-ekwu maka njikwa na ịkpa ókè nke ọ hụrụ mgbe ọ na-etolite na South Africa, mba nke usoro mmegbu na-achịkwa site na ọchịchị ya n'oge gara aga site na ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ.

Ọrụ ya nke a ma ama, "Bureau of Bureaucracy," na-egosi na Smithsonian Renwick Gallery na Washington, DC.  Ọrụ a were afọ isii (site na 1993 ruo 1999) iji mepụta na MIT Hobby Shop na Cambridge. N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, a kpọrọ Bureau of Bureaucracy otu n'ime "Ihe ise dị na Smithsonian Museums nke I na-aghaghi ịhụ" site na Association of Registrars and Collection Specialists (ARCS).

Ọrụ ya nke akpọrọ "Apart-Hate: A People Divider," bụ nke Museum of Arts & Design na New York City nwetara. Akụkụ ahụ apụtala na ihe ngosi MAD nke Re: Collection nke David Revere McFadden haziri, yana ihe ngosi Global Africa Project nke Lowery Stokes Sims na Leslie King-Hammond haziri. Akụkụ Apart-Hate na-egosipụta otu ọha mmadụ si emepụta usoro nke na-ekewa ndị mmadụ nwere ịkpọasị
Judith Dobrzynski, na-ede maka The New York Times, kọwara ọrụ ahụ dị ka "ntụgharị uche na ịkpa ókè".
Ọrụ nke emepụtara na mgbe na-adịbeghị anya, nke akpọrọ "Belabeled" nke Peabody Essex Museum (PEM) nwetara na Salem MA, bụ maka ike nke akara iji kpụzie njirimara
Akara ndị a na-egosi na ndị mmadụ na-etinye onwe ha na ndị ọzọ na-enye atụmanya na ohere dị nta
N'ịchọpụta etu akara si dị mkpa, ọrụ a na-akpọ ndị na-ekiri ka ha maa aka ma chee echiche banyere mkpebi ikpe ha.
